short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What does your favorite song look like?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience your favorite music across the web in a brand new way.

Ever wonder what the music would look like when your favorite musician dives into a solo? Curious about the 'personality' of your favorite song? Do you just want something pretty and new to look at? Install this extension, hit cmd/ctrl + shift + U, and enjoy the show!

Audioforma listens to the audio you have playing in your web browser, and translates the notes it hears into a beautiful visual rendering against the circle of fifths. 

You can choose various color scales for your visual: options like Rainbow, Cubehelix, Inferno and Purple

Audioforma DOES NOT listen to you, or your microphones. This extension is built to "listen" to the audio internally before it reaches your speakers.
